data.translation: Dengan menyebut nama-Mu, ya Allah! Aku mati dan dan hidup.
data.en_translation: In Your name, O Allah, I die and I live.

data.arabic: الحَمْدُ للهِ الَّذِي أَحْيَانَا بعْدَ مَا أماتَنَا وإِلَيْهِ النُّشُورُ
data.latin: alhamdulillahilladzi ahyaanaa ba'da maa amaatanaa wa ilaihin nusyuur
data.translation: Dengan menyebut nama-Mu, ya Allah! Aku mat
data.en_translation: All praise is due to Allah, who gave us life after causing us to die, and to Him is the resurrection.

data.arabic: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبُثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
data.latin: allahumma innii a'uudzubika minal khubutsi wal khabaaitsi
data.translation: Dengan menyebut nama-Mu, ya Allah! Aku mat
data.en_translation: O Allah, I seek refuge in You from the male and female devils.
In the name of Allah (I begin eating).
data.source: HR. al-Bukari No. 5376 dan Muslim No. 2022
